learning_objective: Collect and present the same data in various visual formats.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex, an aspiring entrepreneur, has decided to keep track of their monthly earnings selling handmade bracelets. In January, they earned $200, in February they earned $220, in March they earned $240, in April they earned $210, and in May they earned $230. Which of the following are appropriate ways for Alex to visualize their earnings data over these 5 months? ",
    "Answer1": "Pie chart only.",
    "Answer2": "Line chart and bar chart.",
    "Answer3": "Scatter plot only.",
    "Answer4": "Stacked area chart only.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "2",
    "Explanation": "Line chart and bar chart are the best options as they can properly visualize changes over a period of time, which is suitable for showing Alex's earnings over the 5 months. Pie chart is not suitable because it is used for visualizing parts of a whole. Scatter plots and stacked area charts are also not suitable for this simple data set."
}
